trans-unit.source: Automatically generates single-table commands that are used to reconcile changes made to a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> with the associated database.
trans-unit.target: Genera automaticamente comandi per tabella singola che consentono di risolvere le modifiche apportate a un <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref> con il database associato.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> does not automatically generate the SQL statements required to reconcile changes made to a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> with the associated data source.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>non genera automaticamente le istruzioni SQL necessarie per risolvere le modifiche apportate a un <xref:System.Data.DataSet>con l'origine dati associata.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: However, you can create an OleDbCommandBuilder object to automatically generate SQL statements for single-table updates if you set the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, è possibile creare un oggetto OleDbCommandBuilder per generare automaticamente le istruzioni SQL per gli aggiornamenti a tabella singola, se si imposta la <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>proprietà di <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then, any additional SQL statements that you do not set are generated by the OleDbCommandBuilder.
trans-unit.target: Quindi, le istruzioni SQL aggiuntive che non si imposta generate dal OleDbCommandBuilder.

trans-unit.source: The OleDbCommandBuilder registers itself as a listener for <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events whenever you set the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.DataAdapter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il OleDbCommandBuilder registra se stesso come un listener per <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating>eventi ogni volta che si imposta la <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.DataAdapter%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.DataAdapter%2A> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating>

trans-unit.source: You can only associate one <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> or OleDbCommandBuilder object with each other at one time.
trans-unit.target: È possibile associare solo uno <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>o oggetto OleDbCommandBuilder tra loro in una sola volta.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: To generate INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements, the OleDbCommandBuilder uses the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property to retrieve a required set of metadata automatically.
trans-unit.target: Per generare istruzioni INSERT, UPDATE o DELETE, utilizza il OleDbCommandBuilder il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>proprietà da recuperare automaticamente un set di metadati richiesto.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you change the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> after the metadata is retrieved, such as after the first update, you should call the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> method to update the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Se si modifica il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>dopo il recupero di metadati, ad esempio dopo il primo aggiornamento, è necessario chiamare il <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>metodo per aggiornare i metadati.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The OleDbCommandBuilder also uses the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.Connection%2A>, <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.Transaction%2A> properties referenced by the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizza inoltre il OleDbCommandBuilder il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.Connection%2A>, <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>e <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.Transaction%2A>proprietà a cui fa riferimento il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.Transaction%2A> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.Connection%2A>

trans-unit.source: The user should call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if one or more of these properties are modified, or if the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> itself is replaced.
trans-unit.target: L'utente deve chiamare <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>Se uno o più di queste proprietà vengono modificati o se il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>stessa viene sostituita.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A> properties retain their previous values.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>, e <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A>mantengono i valori precedenti.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>, the OleDbCommandBuilder is disassociated from the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>, and the generated commands are no longer used.
trans-unit.target: Se si chiama <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>, il OleDbCommandBuilder viene annullata l'associazione di <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>, e i comandi generati non vengono più utilizzati.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder"></xref> class with the associated <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder"> </xref> classe con l'oggetto associato <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> registers itself as a listener for <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events that are generated by the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> specified in this property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>Registra se stesso come un listener per <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating>gli eventi generati dal <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>specificato in questa proprietà.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: When you create a new instance <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>, any existing <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> associated with this <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> is released.
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea una nuova istanza <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>, qualsiasi esistente <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>associato a questo <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>viene rilasciato.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter"></xref> object for which SQL statements are automatically generated.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter"> </xref> oggetto per cui SQL le istruzioni vengono generate automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> registers itself as a listener for <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events that are generated by the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> specified in this property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>Registra se stesso come un listener per <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating>gli eventi generati dal <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>specificato in questa proprietà.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: When you create a new instance <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>, any existing <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> associated with this <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> is released.
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea una nuova istanza <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>, qualsiasi esistente <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>associato a questo <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>viene rilasciato.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves parameter information from the stored procedure specified in the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"></xref> and populates the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.Parameters*> collection of the specified <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Recupera le informazioni sui parametri dalla stored procedure specificata nel <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"> </xref> e popolare il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.Parameters*>raccolta dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"> </xref> oggetto.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.Parameters*>

trans-unit.source: DeriveParameters overwrites any existing parameter information for the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand>.
trans-unit.target: DeriveParameters sovrascrive qualsiasi informazione esistente sui parametri per <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand>.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand>

trans-unit.source: DeriveParameters requires an additional call to the data source to obtain the information.
trans-unit.target: DeriveParameters richiede un'ulteriore chiamata all'origine dati per ottenere le informazioni.

trans-unit.source: If the parameter information is known in advance, it is more efficient to populate the parameters collection by setting the information explicitly.
trans-unit.target: Se le informazioni sui parametri è noto in anticipo, risulta più efficiente per popolare la raccolta di parametri impostando le informazioni in modo esplicito.

trans-unit.source: You can only use DeriveParameters with stored procedures.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare solo DeriveParameters con le stored procedure.

trans-unit.source: You cannot use DeriveParameters to populate the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection> with arbitrary Transact-SQL statements, such as a parameterized SELECT statement.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare DeriveParameters per popolare il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection>con le istruzioni Transact-SQL arbitrarie, ad esempio un'istruzione SELECT con parametri.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [configurazione dei parametri e tipi di dati di parametro](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"></xref> referencing the stored procedure from which the parameter information is to be derived.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"> </xref> che fa riferimento la stored procedure da cui è necessario derivare le informazioni sui parametri.

trans-unit.source: The derived parameters are added to the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.Parameters*> collection of the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Vengono aggiunti i parametri derivati per il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.Parameters*>insieme il <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"> </xref>.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.Parameters*>

trans-unit.source: The underlying OLE DB provider does not support returning stored procedure parameter information, the command text is not a valid stored procedure name, or the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandType*> specified was not <xref uid="langword_csharp_StoredProcedure" name="StoredProcedure" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il provider OLE DB sottostante non supporta la restituzione di informazioni sui parametri di stored procedure, il testo del comando non è un nome di stored procedure valido, o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandType*>specificato non è stato <xref uid="langword_csharp_StoredProcedure" name="StoredProcedure" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandType*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions at the data source.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene generato automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"> </xref> oggetto richiesto per eseguire le operazioni di eliminazione dell'origine dati.

trans-unit.source: An application can use the GetDeleteCommand method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Un'applicazione può utilizzare il metodo GetDeleteCommand per scopi informativi o di risoluzione dei problemi in quanto restituisce il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand>oggetto da eseguire.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand>

trans-unit.source: You can also use GetDeleteCommand as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile utilizzare GetDeleteCommand come base di un comando modificato.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call GetDeleteCommand and modify the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, si potrebbe chiamare GetDeleteCommand e modificare il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>valore e quindi impostare in modo esplicito che in <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver generata l'istruzione SQL, l'applicazione deve chiamare in modo esplicito <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>Se viene modificato l'istruzione in alcun modo.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the GetDeleteCommand will be still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, si sarà il GetDeleteCommand continuerà a utilizzare le informazioni dell'istruzione precedente, che potrebbe non essere corretto.

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or GetDeleteCommand.
trans-unit.target: Le istruzioni SQL vengono generate quando l'applicazione chiama uno <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.Update%2A>o GetDeleteCommand.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions.
trans-unit.target: Generato automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"> </xref> l'oggetto richiesto per eseguire operazioni di eliminazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions at the data source.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene generato automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"> </xref> oggetto richiesto per eseguire le operazioni di eliminazione dell'origine dati.

trans-unit.source: An application can use the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Un'applicazione può utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>a scopo di metodo informativi o di risoluzione dei problemi in quanto restituisce il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand>oggetto da eseguire.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile utilizzare <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>come base di un comando modificato.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> and modify the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile chiamare <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>e modificare il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>valore e quindi impostare in modo esplicito che in <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver generata l'istruzione SQL, l'applicazione deve chiamare in modo esplicito <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>Se viene modificato l'istruzione in alcun modo.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> will be still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>sarà continuerà a utilizzare le informazioni dell'istruzione precedente, che potrebbe non essere corretto.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Le istruzioni SQL vengono generate quando l'applicazione chiama uno <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.Update%2A>o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters.
trans-unit.target: Durante la generazione di nomi di parametro, il comportamento predefinito consiste nell'usare @p1, @p2, e così via per i diversi parametri.

trans-unit.source: Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter lets you force the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> to generate parameters based on the column names instead.
trans-unit.target: Il passaggio di `true` per il `useColumnsForParameterNames` parametro consente di forzare il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>generi i parametri in base ai nomi di colonna invece.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo ha esito positivo solo se vengono soddisfatte le condizioni seguenti: - il <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>è stato specificato e la sua lunghezza è uguale o maggiore rispetto al nome di parametro generato.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>

trans-unit.source: - The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> regular expression.
trans-unit.target: -Il nome di parametro generato soddisfa i criteri specificati nel <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>espressione regolare.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat> is specified.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>specificato.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, generate parameter names matching column names, if it is possible.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, generare nomi di parametro corrispondente di nomi di colonna, se possibile.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, generate @p1, @p2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, generare @p1, @p2e così via.

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions.
trans-unit.target: Generato automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"> </xref> l'oggetto richiesto per eseguire operazioni di eliminazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"></xref> object required to perform insertions at the data source.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene generato automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"> </xref> oggetto richiesto per eseguire le operazioni di inserimento nell'origine dati.

trans-unit.source: An application can use the GetInsertCommand method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the text of the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Un'applicazione può utilizzare il metodo metodi GetInsertCommand per scopi informativi o di risoluzione dei problemi in quanto restituisce il testo del <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand>oggetto da eseguire.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand>

trans-unit.source: You can also use GetInsertCommand as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile utilizzare metodi GetInsertCommand come base di un comando modificato.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call GetInsertCommand and modify the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, si potrebbe chiamare metodi GetInsertCommand e modificare il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>valore e quindi impostare in modo esplicito che in <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver generata l'istruzione SQL, l'applicazione deve chiamare in modo esplicito <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>Se viene modificato l'istruzione in alcun modo.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the GetInsertCommand will be still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, si sarà i metodi GetInsertCommand continuerà a utilizzare le informazioni dell'istruzione precedente, che potrebbe non essere corretto.

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or GetInsertCommand.
trans-unit.target: Le istruzioni SQL vengono generate quando l'applicazione chiama uno <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.Update%2A>o metodi GetInsertCommand.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"></xref> object required to perform insertions.
trans-unit.target: Generato automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"> </xref> oggetto richiesto per eseguire le operazioni di inserimento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"></xref> object required to perform insertions at the data source.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene generato automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"> </xref> oggetto richiesto per eseguire le operazioni di inserimento nell'origine dati.

trans-unit.source: An application can use the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the text of the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Un'applicazione può utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>a scopo di metodo informativi o di risoluzione dei problemi in quanto restituisce il testo del <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand>oggetto da eseguire.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile utilizzare <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>come base di un comando modificato.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> and modify the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile chiamare <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>e modificare il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>valore e quindi impostare in modo esplicito che in <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver generata l'istruzione SQL, l'applicazione deve chiamare in modo esplicito <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>Se viene modificato l'istruzione in alcun modo.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> will be still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>sarà continuerà a utilizzare le informazioni dell'istruzione precedente, che potrebbe non essere corretto.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Le istruzioni SQL vengono generate quando l'applicazione chiama uno <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.Update%2A>o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters.
trans-unit.target: Durante la generazione di nomi di parametro, il comportamento predefinito consiste nell'usare @p1, @p2, e così via per i diversi parametri.

trans-unit.source: Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter lets you force the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> to generate parameters based on the column names instead.
trans-unit.target: Il passaggio di `true` per il `useColumnsForParameterNames` parametro consente di forzare il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>generi i parametri in base ai nomi di colonna invece.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo ha esito positivo solo se vengono soddisfatte le condizioni seguenti: - il <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>è stato specificato e la sua lunghezza è uguale o maggiore rispetto al nome di parametro generato.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>

trans-unit.source: - The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> regular expression.
trans-unit.target: -Il nome di parametro generato soddisfa i criteri specificati nel <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>espressione regolare.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat> is specified.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>specificato.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, generate parameter names matching column names, if it is possible.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, generare nomi di parametro corrispondente di nomi di colonna, se possibile.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, generate @p1, @p2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, generare @p1, @p2e così via.

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"></xref> object required to perform insertions.
trans-unit.target: Generato automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"> </xref> oggetto richiesto per eseguire le operazioni di inserimento.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"></xref> object required to perform updates at the data source.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene generato automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"> </xref> oggetto richiesto per eseguire gli aggiornamenti nell'origine dati.

trans-unit.source: An application can use the GetUpdateCommand method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Un'applicazione può utilizzare il metodo GetUpdateCommand per scopi informativi o di risoluzione dei problemi in quanto restituisce il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand>oggetto da eseguire.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand>

trans-unit.source: You can also use GetUpdateCommand as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile utilizzare GetUpdateCommand come base di un comando modificato.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call GetUpdateCommand and modify the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, si potrebbe chiamare GetUpdateCommand e modificare il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>valore e quindi impostare in modo esplicito che in <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver generata l'istruzione SQL, l'applicazione deve chiamare in modo esplicito <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>Se viene modificato l'istruzione in alcun modo.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the GetUpdateCommand will be still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, si sarà il GetUpdateCommand continuerà a utilizzare le informazioni dell'istruzione precedente, che potrebbe non essere corretto.

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or GetUpdateCommand.
trans-unit.target: Le istruzioni SQL vengono generate quando l'applicazione chiama uno <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.Update%2A>o GetUpdateCommand.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"></xref> object required to perform updates.
trans-unit.target: Generato automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"> </xref> oggetto richiesto per eseguire gli aggiornamenti.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"></xref> object required to perform updates at the data source, optionally using columns for parameter names.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene generato automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"> </xref> oggetto richiesto per eseguire gli aggiornamenti nell'origine dati, eventualmente utilizzando le colonne per i nomi dei parametri.

trans-unit.source: An application can use the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Un'applicazione può utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>a scopo di metodo informativi o di risoluzione dei problemi in quanto restituisce il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand>oggetto da eseguire.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile utilizzare <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>come base di un comando modificato.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> and modify the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile chiamare <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>e modificare il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>valore e quindi impostare in modo esplicito che in <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver generata l'istruzione SQL, l'applicazione deve chiamare in modo esplicito <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>Se viene modificato l'istruzione in alcun modo.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> will be still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>sarà continuerà a utilizzare le informazioni dell'istruzione precedente, che potrebbe non essere corretto.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Le istruzioni SQL vengono generate quando l'applicazione chiama uno <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.Update%2A>o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters.
trans-unit.target: Durante la generazione di nomi di parametro, il comportamento predefinito consiste nell'usare @p1, @p2, e così via per i diversi parametri.

trans-unit.source: Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter lets you force the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> to generate parameters based on the column names instead.
trans-unit.target: Il passaggio di `true` per il `useColumnsForParameterNames` parametro consente di forzare il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>generi i parametri in base ai nomi di colonna invece.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo ha esito positivo solo se vengono soddisfatte le condizioni seguenti: - il <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>è stato specificato e la sua lunghezza è uguale o maggiore rispetto al nome di parametro generato.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>

trans-unit.source: - The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> regular expression.
trans-unit.target: -Il nome di parametro generato soddisfa i criteri specificati nel <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>espressione regolare.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat> is specified.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>specificato.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, generate parameter names matching column names, if it is possible.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, generare nomi di parametro corrispondente di nomi di colonna, se possibile.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, generate @p1, @p2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, generare @p1, @p2e così via.

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"></xref> object required to perform updates.
trans-unit.target: Generato automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"> </xref> oggetto richiesto per eseguire gli aggiornamenti.

trans-unit.source: Given an unquoted identifier in the correct catalog case, returns the correct quoted form of that identifier.
trans-unit.target: Dato un identificatore non racchiusi tra virgolette nel caso del catalogo, restituisce la corretta forma dell'identificatore delimitato.

trans-unit.source: This includes correctly escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
trans-unit.target: Sono inclusi caratteri di escape correttamente eventuali virgolette nell'identificatore.

trans-unit.source: The original unquoted identifier.
trans-unit.target: L'identificatore non racchiusi tra virgolette originale.

trans-unit.source: The quoted version of the identifier.
trans-unit.target: Versione dell'identificatore tra virgolette.

trans-unit.source: Embedded quotes within the identifier are correctly escaped.
trans-unit.target: Le virgolette incorporate all'interno dell'identificatore sono corretto carattere di escape.

trans-unit.source: Given an unquoted identifier in the correct catalog case, returns the correct quoted form of that identifier.
trans-unit.target: Dato un identificatore non racchiusi tra virgolette nel caso del catalogo, restituisce la corretta forma dell'identificatore delimitato.

trans-unit.source: This includes correctly escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
trans-unit.target: Sono inclusi caratteri di escape correttamente eventuali virgolette nell'identificatore.

trans-unit.source: The unquoted identifier to be returned in quoted format.
trans-unit.target: L'identificatore non racchiusi tra virgolette da restituire in formato racchiuso tra virgolette.

trans-unit.source: When a connection is passed, causes the managed wrapper to get the quote character from the OLE DB provider.
trans-unit.target: Quando una connessione viene passata, fa sì che il wrapper gestito ottenere il carattere di offerta dal provider OLE DB.

trans-unit.source: When no connection is passed, the string is quoted using values from <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuotePrefix*> and <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuoteSuffix*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando non viene passata alcuna connessione, la stringa tra virgolette citata utilizzando i valori <> </> *> e <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: The quoted version of the identifier.
trans-unit.target: Versione dell'identificatore tra virgolette.

trans-unit.source: Embedded quotes within the identifier are correctly escaped.
trans-unit.target: Le virgolette incorporate all'interno dell'identificatore sono corretto carattere di escape.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Given a quoted identifier, returns the correct unquoted form of that identifier.
trans-unit.target: Dato un identificatore tra virgolette, restituisce il formato corretto senza virgolette dell'identificatore.

trans-unit.source: This includes correctly un-escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
trans-unit.target: Ciò include correttamente sottoposte a escape eventuali virgolette nell'identificatore.

trans-unit.source: The identifier that will have its embedded quotes removed.
trans-unit.target: Identificatore da cui verranno rimosse le virgolette incorporate.

trans-unit.source: The unquoted identifier, with embedded quotes correctly un-escaped.
trans-unit.target: Identificatore non racchiusi tra virgolette con virgolette incorporate correttamente sottoposti a escape.

trans-unit.source: Given a quoted identifier, returns the correct unquoted form of that identifier.
trans-unit.target: Dato un identificatore tra virgolette, restituisce il formato corretto senza virgolette dell'identificatore.

trans-unit.source: This includes correctly un-escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
trans-unit.target: Ciò include correttamente sottoposte a escape eventuali virgolette nell'identificatore.

trans-unit.source: The identifier that will have its embedded quotes removed.
trans-unit.target: Identificatore da cui verranno rimosse le virgolette incorporate.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The unquoted identifier, with embedded quotes correctly un-escaped.
trans-unit.target: Identificatore non racchiusi tra virgolette con virgolette incorporate correttamente sottoposti a escape.
